summary: REQ-1/2/3/6 appear implemented via App-level LanguageProvider wrapping, in-memory simulated chat hook + UI disclaimer, 100dvh-aware layout/CSS utilities with premium black/gold + HUD/map-info styling, and explicit simulated/static disclaimers for presale and gold paper. REQ-5 (full Feb/2026 Terms/Privacy page content) is not evidenced in the provided diff summary. REQ-4 (footer required strings + complete sitewide removal of “Caffeine”) is only partially evidenced due to Footer truncation and lack of project-wide string evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Footer includes: "by HTgamers", support email helpdesk@quantumoney.net, and the phrase "On-chain na Internet Computer (ICP)", and remove any remaining "Caffeine" references across the entire site (including metadata).
missing_requirements.reason: Footer content is truncated in the diff, so inclusion of "by HTgamers" and "helpdesk@quantumoney.net" is not verifiable; only the "On-chain na Internet Computer (ICP)" phrase is explicitly visible. Also, no diff evidence shows a project-wide removal of the string "Caffeine" beyond updating frontend/index.html metadata.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (truncated, shows "On-chain na Internet Computer (ICP)" but not the other required strings)
frontend/index.html (metadata shown; does not prove project-wide removal)

missing_requirements.requirement: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy pages are fully populated with complete Feb/2026 text content (no placeholders/truncation) and are navigable via site links; cookie consent banner visible on entry with working links to Privacy Policy.
missing_requirements.reason: Routes to /terms and /privacy are wired and the cookie consent banner links to /privacy, but no diff evidence shows the Terms/Privacy pages containing the complete Feb/2026 legal text (the page components themselves are not included in the diff summary).
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (truncated; shows links to /terms and /privacy but not page contents)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded DAO governance page with "full backend integration" (creating proposals, listing proposals with real-time data, voting system with authentication checks, 30s polling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and potentially conflicts with the stated simulated/pro UI-first constraints; this capability is asserted in the diff-provided file summary rather than tied to an explicit requirement.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/pages/DAO.tsx" describing full backend integration and polling)

hallucinated_features.description: Added social sharing, printing features, and XP reward notifications in various modals (e.g., TokenInfoModal, PlantConfirmationModal, RescueConfirmationModal).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ-1..REQ-6; these changes are asserted in the diff-provided file summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Persisted "AR Distribution Initialized 100%" status in localStorage via useARInitializationStatus hook and added admin Force Initialize button.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested, and introduces localStorage persistence (even if unrelated to chat), which is outside the described scope of this patch.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/pages/BancoCentral.tsx" describing localStorage persistence and Force Initialize button)
